#### Shiny Visualization
```{r}
library(shiny)
library(shinydashboard)
## load data 
countries <- read.delim("Data/countries.txt")

```

```{r}
header <- dashboardHeader(
  title = "Genius Ashish",
  titleWidth = 250
)

sidebar <- dashboardSidebar(
  sidebarMenu(
    menuItem(
      text='Homepage',
      tabName = 'homepage'),
    menuItem(
      text = 'Country Detail',
      tabName = 'countryspecifics'),
    menuItem(
      selectInput(
        "select",
        label = h3("Select a Country"),
        choices = Xian$Country
        
      )
    )
    
    )
)
  


body <- dashboardBody(
  tabItems(
    tabItem(
      tabNmae="rank",
      tabBox(
        title="Easiness Rank"),
      ),
    tabItem(
      tabName="Urban Population"
      
    )
    )
  )


ui <- dashboardPage(header,sidebar,body)
server <- function(input, output){}
shinyApp(ui,server)

```
